author: Chao Hick Tin JA (delivering the judgment of the court):
casename: Law Society of Singapore v Ong Lilian
coram: Chao Hick Tin JA; Lai Siu Chiu J; Tan Lee Meng J
counsel: Aziz Tayabali (Aziz Tayabali and Associates) for the applicant; The respondent absent
tags-parsed: Legal Profession/Professional conduct/Show cause action/Advocate and solicitor of 31 years' standing convicted of theft in dwelling/Whether advocate & solicitor unfit for legal profession/Whether offence not done in capacity as lawyer relevant/Whether appropriate for court to grant application/Appropriate penalty/Section 83(1), 83(2)(a), 94A & 98(1) Legal Profession Act (Cap 161, 2001 Rev Ed)
